products.name: African Language Learning Poster Set
products.description: Transform any learning space into an immersive African language classroom with our comprehensive poster set. This collection includes four beautifully designed educational posters featuring the Akan Alphabet, Swahili Numbers (1-8), Common Phrases in multiple languages, and the complete Hausa Alphabet.
features: Covers Akan, Swahili, and Hausa languages

products.name: iSPEAK Alphabet Flashcards
products.description: Make learning the alphabet an adventure with our iSPEAK Alphabet Flashcards! This comprehensive set features 52 double-sided cards showcasing letters paired with culturally relevant objects and animals.

products.name: African Tales with Paji - Storybook
products.description: Join Paji and friends on magical adventures across Africa! This beautifully illustrated hardcover storybook introduces children to African wildlife, landscapes, and valuable life lessons through engaging narratives.

products.name: Kiswahili Phrases for Kids
products.description: Open the door to Kiswahili with this essential phrase book designed specifically for young learners! Features over 100 common phrases with phonetic pronunciations and colorful illustrations.

products.name: iSPEAK T-Shirt (Adult)
products.description: Show your support for African language education with our premium iSPEAK adult t-shirt. Made from 100% organic cotton with our signature logo.

products.name: Paji T-Shirt - Kids
products.description: Let your little language learner show off their Paji pride! This colorful kids' t-shirt features our adorable Paji mascot in vibrant colors.

products.name: iSPEAK Kids T-Shirt
products.description: Inspire young minds with our iSPEAK kids' t-shirt! Designed for comfort during active learning and play.

products.name: iSPEAK Navy Hoodie
products.description: Stay warm while representing African language education! Premium navy hoodie with embroidered iSPEAK logo.

products.name: iSPEAK Cap
products.description: Top off your outfit with our stylish iSPEAK cap! Features high-quality embroidery and comfortable fit.

products.name: Teaching African Languages Coffee Mug
products.description: Start every day inspired with our 'Teaching African Languages' coffee mug featuring Paji! Perfect for educators and language enthusiasts.

products.name: iSPEAK Canvas Tote Bag
products.description: Carry your language learning materials in style! Durable canvas tote perfect for books, supplies, or daily essentials.

products.name: Paji Mascot Backpack
products.description: Make learning an adventure with the Paji Mascot Backpack! Colorful design with plenty of room for books and supplies.

products.name: Paji Water Bottle
products.description: Stay hydrated during language learning with our BPA-free Paji water bottle featuring colorful graphics.

products.name: African Heritage Pattern Notebook
products.description: Capture your language learning journey in our beautiful notebook featuring authentic Kente and Adinkra designs.

products.name: Paji Sticker Sheet
products.description: Brighten any surface with our Paji sticker collection! Features Paji in various fun poses.

products.name: Paji Plush Toy - Soft Cuddly Mascot
products.description: Meet Paji, your child's new best friend! This adorable 12" plush toy features Paji in signature turquoise, purple, and yellow colors.

products.name: Paji Squishy Stress Relief Toy
products.description: Squeeze away stress while learning! Adorable Paji squishy made from slow-rising, non-toxic foam.
